response.job_title: Electrical Engineer | Project Manager | Renewable Energy
response.summary:
Electrical Engineer at Universidad Nacional de Colombia. Knowledge on electrical power systems, high voltage tests, live line work and project management trainee. Teamwork skills, proactive person and always with the purpose of achieving a higher level of personal and professional growth.

Curriculum vitae (CV): https://cutt.ly/aEW4jqW
response.skills: Product Goal, Product Management, Planning, Stakeholder Management, Agile Practices, Agile Team Leader, Continous Process Improvement, Scrum Master, Scrum Team, Self-Management, Agile, Scrum, Agile Mindset, Teamwork, Critical thinking, Active listening, AutoCAD, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Project, Microsoft Access

profile_positions.description:
✓ Development of tools for the control, supervision and monitoring of project documentation.
✓ Rigorous monitoring of project progress and generation of early warnings of deviations from the project baseline.
✓ Preparation of internal and external project progress reports.
✓ Support in the analysis of particular risks and market conditions in order to avoid possible damages or prevent problems.
✓ Ensure compliance with the procurement plan of the project according to the definition of engineering and customer approval. 
✓ Support the logistics required to supply the project's materials during its manufacturing or start-up stage.
✓ Support in the coordination with the Engineering/Testing/Commissioning staff in the activities related to the Project deliverables.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
✓ Live Line work coordinator and supervisor, coordinate the activities of the maintenance projects for electrical networks at medium and high voltage substations with hot sticks, rubber gloves and barehand methods, contracted by the company in accordance with the established contracts.
✓ Correct execution of corrective maintenance activities and prevention of transmission lines and substations with contact, distance and potential methods.
✓ Application of protocols established by the company, verification, inspection and risk assessment.
✓ Register and control the costs and expenses of maintenance activities and necessary repairs.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Engineer

company.name: LABE - Laboratorio de Ensayos Eléctricos Industriales Fabio Chaparro

profile_positions.company: LABE - Laboratory of Industrial Electrical Testing, Calibration & Innovation Fabio Chaparro
profile_positions.description:
✓ Support the preparation and execution of the tests in the module of high voltage.
✓ Implement current regulations applicable to high voltage module test methods (e.g. IEC 60060-1 and IEEE Std. 4)
✓ Support and participation in the compliance, verification and monitoring of the quality management system according to NTC-ISO / IEC 17025.
profile_positions.title: Engineering assistant

profile_positions.company: LABE - Laboratory of Industrial Electrical Testing, Calibration & Innovation Fabio Chaparro
profile_positions.description: ✓ Carry out procedure manuals for intermediate checks of measurement equipment implemented in tests accredited to ONAC in the high voltage module.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Engineering Internship

company.name: Siemens
company.description:
Siemens is a technology company focused on industry, infrastructure, transport, and healthcare. From more resource-efficient factories, resilient supply chains, and smarter buildings and grids, to cleaner and more comfortable transportation as well as advanced healthcare, the company creates technology with purpose adding real value for customers. By combining the real and the digital worlds, Siemens empowers its customers to transform their industries and markets, helping them to transform the everyday for billions of people. Siemens also owns a majority stake in the publicly listed company Siemens Healthineers, a globally leading medical technology provider shaping the future of healthcare. In addition, Siemens holds a minority stake in Siemens Energy, a global leader in the transmission and generation of electrical power.
In fiscal 2022, which ended on September 30, 2022, the Siemens Group generated revenue of €72.0 billion and net income of €4.4 billion. As of September 30, 2022, the company had around 311,000 employees worldwide. Further information is available at www.siemens.com.
